name: test condition for scoring_format_hash param, multiple fantasy points from play
description: Test case for test condition for scoring_format_hash param, multiple fantasy points from play
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2023]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years WHERE player.pos IN ('WR')), "te28af74c7cf436b69ce8f6c02f3f9092" as (select "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid", count(*) as "rate_type_total_count", array_agg(distinct player_gamelogs_year_2023.tm) as teams, "nfl_games"."year" from "player_gamelogs_year_2023" left join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."esbid" where "nfl_games"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."active" = true and "nfl_games"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_games"."week" in (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8) group by "nfl_games"."year", "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid"), "t5bf3efa44adb1d42c9e2b0267da8d762" as (select "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid", count(*) as "rate_type_total_count", array_agg(distinct player_gamelogs_year_2023.tm) as teams, "nfl_games"."year" from "player_gamelogs_year_2023" left join "nfl_games" on "nfl_games"."esbid" = "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."esbid" where "nfl_games"."seas_type" in ('REG') and "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."active" = true and "nfl_games"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_games"."week" in (10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 9) group by "nfl_games"."year", "player_gamelogs_year_2023"."pid"), "t4ea39b58c3d110782f5bf6537e58a6b5" as (with "filtered_plays" as (select "nfl_plays"."bc_pid", "nfl_plays"."psr_pid", "nfl_plays"."trg_pid", "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid", "nfl_plays"."week", "nfl_plays"."seas_type", "nfl_plays"."year", "nfl_plays"."rush_yds", "nfl_plays"."rush_td", "nfl_plays"."pass_yds", "nfl_plays"."pass_td", "nfl_plays"."recv_yds", "nfl_plays"."comp", "nfl_plays"."int", "nfl_plays"."first_down", "nfl_plays"."play_type", "nfl_plays"."fuml" from "nfl_plays" where "nfl_plays"."play_type" not in ('NOPL') and ("nfl_plays"."bc_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."psr_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."trg_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."week" in (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG')) select "pid", SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from (select * from (select "bc_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rush_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(rush_td::int, 0) * 6), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "bc_pid" is not null group by "bc_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "bc_stats" union all select * from (select "psr_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(pass_yds, 0) * 0.04 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 4 + COALESCE("int"::int, 0) * -1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "psr_pid" is not null group by "psr_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "psr_stats" union all select * from (select "trg_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(recv_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 6 + COALESCE(comp::int, 0) * 1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "trg_pid" is not null group by "trg_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "trg_stats" union all select * from (select "player_fuml_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(-1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "player_fuml_pid" is not null group by "player_fuml_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "fuml_stats") as "combined_stats" group by "pid", "seas_type", "year" having SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) > 0), "te662433fee69bfca3b1678a8c26aa4b0" as (with "filtered_plays" as (select "nfl_plays"."bc_pid", "nfl_plays"."psr_pid", "nfl_plays"."trg_pid", "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid", "nfl_plays"."week", "nfl_plays"."seas_type", "nfl_plays"."year", "nfl_plays"."rush_yds", "nfl_plays"."rush_td", "nfl_plays"."pass_yds", "nfl_plays"."pass_td", "nfl_plays"."recv_yds", "nfl_plays"."comp", "nfl_plays"."int", "nfl_plays"."first_down", "nfl_plays"."play_type", "nfl_plays"."fuml" from "nfl_plays" where "nfl_plays"."play_type" not in ('NOPL') and ("nfl_plays"."bc_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."psr_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."trg_pid" is not null or "nfl_plays"."player_fuml_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."week" in (10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 9) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG')) select "pid", SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from (select * from (select "bc_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(rush_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(rush_td::int, 0) * 6), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "bc_pid" is not null group by "bc_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "bc_stats" union all select * from (select "psr_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(pass_yds, 0) * 0.04 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 4 + COALESCE("int"::int, 0) * -1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "psr_pid" is not null group by "psr_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "psr_stats" union all select * from (select "trg_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(recv_yds, 0) * 0.1 + COALESCE(pass_td::int, 0) * 6 + COALESCE(comp::int, 0) * 1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "trg_pid" is not null group by "trg_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "trg_stats" union all select * from (select "player_fuml_pid" as "pid", ROUND(SUM(-1), 2) as fantasy_points_from_plays, "seas_type", "year" from "filtered_plays" where "player_fuml_pid" is not null group by "player_fuml_pid", "seas_type", "year") as "fuml_stats") as "combined_stats" group by "pid", "seas_type", "year" having SUM(fantasy_points_from_plays) > 0) select "tb9b614943131b9f2cbe8a4753294dfcb"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "tb9b614943131b9f2cbe8a4753294dfcb"."points_per_game" AS AS "fantasy_points_from_plays_0", CAST(te662433fee69bfca3b1678a8c26aa4b0.fantasy_points_from_plays AS DECIMAL) / NULLIF(CAST(t5bf3efa44adb1d42c9e2b0267da8d762.rate_type_total_count AS DECIMAL), 0) AS
